short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add button to Check Bitcoin prices as well as Bitcoin news

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get awesome Bitcoin charts on your browser in as little as 30 seconds and be on your way to the next task. Widgets provide free real-time bitcoin data prices as well as Bitcoin news.
